ingredients.content: 450 g tinned butter beans, rinsed, drained (2 x 400 g tins)
½ tsp fine sea salt, or to taste
2 pinches ground black pepper, or to taste

preparations.content: Place parsley in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place garlic in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 8<b>.
Add leeks, oil and thyme then chop <b>4 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>5 min/100°C//speed 1<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add butter beans and simmer <b>5 min/100°C//speed <b> .
Add crème fraîche, salt, pepper and reserved chopped parsley then stir in with spatula. Serve hot - works well with roast lamb.
